name: Day at the Lake 3: A Night at the Lake
name_original: Day at the Lake 3: A Night at the Lake
description:
Day at the Lake 3: A Night at the Lake is an action-arcade game developed by Skeletrumpet Games. It was originally released in 2014. It was published by Skeletrumpet Games.
You can play Day at the Lake 3: A Night at the Lake on PC.
